name: Veloci
description:
A simple game made for Juice Jam II in which you hold left click to slow time and release it to dash - kill enemies to gain EXP and level up to get a choice from a few cards to upgrade your character

Be careful though,  you may pay the price with your life if you spam dash too much

-This game works fine on some of my friend's computers and breaks on others, I cannot find a pattern so sorry if it isn't working for you-
